title: the free sale component partly or fully shall be granted in the form of Slum T
clause_text: the free sale component partly or fully shall be granted in the form of Slum T.D.R. (total sanctioned F.S.I. of S.R.S. - consumed in-situ F.S.I.) by the concerned Authority with the recommendation of C.E.O., S.R.A.
section: Notwithstanding the provisions in clause mentioned above, if the developer does not desire to consume the full permissible in-situ F.S.I. on the same site, in such a case :
